mapper.select: select ct.content_type_id, ct.name from userpreference up, content_type ct where user_id = #{userId} and up.content_type_id=ct.content_type_id

select content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel from attraction_info where content_id = #{contentId}

select content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel from attraction_info where
(latitude between (#{latitude} - #{range}) and (#{latitude} + #{range})) and (longitude between (#{longitude} - #{range}) and (#{longitude} + #{range}))
and (content_type_id = #{contentTypeId})
and (sido_code = #{sidoCode})
and (gugun_code = #{gugunCode})
and ( (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or (addr1 like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or (addr2 like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) )
order by readcount desc limit 10

select content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel, (select avg(score) from rates r where ai.content_id = r.content_id) rate from attraction_info ai order by rate desc limit 8

select ai.content_id, ai.content_type_id, ai.title, ai.addr1, ai.addr2, ai.zipcode, ai.tel, ai.first_image, ai.first_image2, ai.readcount, ai.sido_code, ai.gugun_code, ai.latitude, ai.longitude, ai.mlevel, (select avg(score) from rates where content_id=ai.content_id) rate from attraction_info ai, members m, plan p, course c where m.user_id in #{userId} and m.plan_id=p.plan_id and c.plan_id = p.plan_id and c.content_id=ai.content_id group by ai.content_id order by rate desc;
